title: What the font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162752im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/WTF2_4751.jpg)
 Hello, does anybody know what the name of this font is. I remember seeing it before, but can’t remember the name. Thanks
 [‹ ID : \>\>\>\>\>\>\>\>\> Deutsche Borse Poster ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162752/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46756 "Go to previous forum topic") [Old typewriter font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162752/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46552 "Go to next forum topic")
author: alisong

comments.content:
I thought [Fur](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162752/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/fur/) was the answer until I looked at the font itself. It’s only similar in style, not details.

You can find similar looks at Dafont in the ’Eroded’ category, but I didn’t see an exact match.

- Mike Yanega

[Atomic Suck](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162752/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/synfonts/atomic-suck/) from Synfonts is also similar.

- Mike Yanega
